_admin.MUTE_DESC:
Mute group chat. Only admins can send messages.
⌨️ Example: #group close & #group open
_admin.UNMUTE_DESC: Open a group chat. Anyone can send messages.

_instagram.STALK_DESC:
This command is to view/stalk someone's instagram account
Use Example
.igstalk dobda.id
